title: Hydroaminomethylation of methyl 10-undecenoate with integrated catalyst recycling via a thermomorphic multiphase system for the continuous production of renewable amines
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00109E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anna Kampwerth, Tim B. Riemer, Jonathan Pöttker-Menke, Nadine Oppenberg, Arno M. Windisch, Dieter Vogt, Thomas Seidensticker
The continuous production of renewable bifunctional amines was accomplished by the hydroaminomethylation of methyl 10-undecenoate with integrated catalyst recycling via a thermomorphic multiphase system.
